data: A friend of mine, who is a man of letters and a philosopher, said to me one day, as if between jest and earnest, “Fancy! since we last met I have discovered a haunted house in the midst of London.”
The Haunted and the Haunters; Or, The House and the Brain
browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: crime, thrillers and mystery|category: novels|category: british literature
